title: Orlando Health Jewett Orthopedic Institute - Support & Rehab
description: Learn how our physical and occupational therapists help patients regain mobility.
cleaned_text: About the Rehabilitation and Sports Medicine Center Whether you have suffered an injury or are recovering from surgery, rehabilitation services - physical and occupational therapy - play an important role in restoring and maximizing your function and mobility. Our licensed and certified professionals work closely with your physician to design a plan of therapy that meets your individual needs. They implement a progressive, specialized approach to injury treatment that combines patient education, individualized exercise, hands-on therapy and a full range of therapies. Our goal is to help you get back to work and your favorite activities. Schedule your evaluation Today! What to Expect During your Treatment A dedicated therapist will be chosen to work with you based on your needs. - Your therapist will develop a comprehensive, goal-oriented treatment plan and discuss it with you during your initial evaluation. - We'll communicate with you and your doctor throughout your treatment to monitor and keep you up-to-date on your progress and healing process. - Hands-on therapy, exercise, strength training, balance training, use of technology may be used to help you return to your previous level of function, reduce pain and be able to reduce recurrence oof injury. - Appointments last approximately 1hr.
